Synopsis: Removes leading, trailing, and extra white spaces from a given text string.
Description: The Remove-WhiteSpace function removes any leading, trailing, and extra white spaces from the input text string. It ensures that only single spaces separate words within the text.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
$MyValue = Remove-WhiteSpace -Text '   My    Field  '
# $MyValue now contains 'My Field'
